name: Pryz
description: PRYZ is the first of its kind, next-generation launchpad for upcoming cryptocurrency projects. Investors who hold our native token PRYZ have the opportunity to invest in new and exciting projects ahead of the general public, also known as “Presales”. PRYZ is deployed on the Polygon Network to provide our investors all of the benefits of the Ethereum Network while also having the additional scalability, speed of transactions and smaller gas fees that are associated with a layer 2 scaling solution. Going forward PRYZ will be bridged to other networks and the Polygon network offers the required multi-chain flexibility required to complete this.
